#Text=Budapest/Hegyvidék
#Text=Hegyvidék is a district in Budapest .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Hegyvidék ( The Mount area ) comprises all of the 12th & 2nd districts .
#Text=It is the most exclusive area , with villas , embassies and foreign residences .
#Text=This is the ' greenest ' part of the city .
#Text=Here is the city highest hill János hegy ( 527 m above sea level ) .
#Text=It is situated in Buda the northwestern part .
#Text=In north and northeast the III .
#Text=district called Óbuda ( Old Buda ) , in the east the Danube river by XIII . and V. district , Belváros Downtown or " Inner city " .
#Text=To the southeast is the I. district called Belbuda ( Inner Buda ) .
#Text=To the south is the XI . district Újbuda and Tétény ( New Buda and Teteny ) .
#Text=The neighboring communities are Budakeszi and Budaörs .
#Text=Because a significant part of the district is covered by forest , the area is very popular for local hikers , and as a residence for wealthy people .
#Text=Countless luxurious villas , flashy cars and upscale quarter are located here , as are diplomatic offices .
#Text=Get in
#Text=The major transport hubs : Szell Kalman Square ( former Moszkva Square ) and
#Text=Hűvösvölgy Transport Hub , II .
#Text=Hűvösvölgyi út ~213 ( : Széll Kálmán tér further take tram 61 to end stop ) .
#Text=Also a hundred meters away is the end station of the Széchenyi Hill Children 's Railways
#Text=Metro
#Text=Two stations are located here :
#Text=Buses
#Text=Bus 16 , 16A and 116 go to Buda castle from :
#Text=Széll Kálmán tér .
#Text=Bus 21 very useful exploring Jan Mountain or Secheni Mountain ( János-hegy or Széchenyi-hegy ) , these are part of the Buda Protected Landscape Area .
#Text=Trams

#Text=The district is the most important tram is No.61 between Hűvösvölgy and Móricz Square , the former is a transport hub for the northern part of district , to transport hub to New Buda ( Újbuda ) .
#Text=You can catch it at : Szell Kalman tér or : Deli Pályaudvar
#Text=Other transport modes
#Text=Cogwheel tram ( Fogaskerekű ) .
#Text=Using in the Buda Hills is a great escape from the city .
#Text=The cogwheel tram , which is tram 61 , leaves from Varosmajor , accessible by tram : 59 or 61 from Szell Kalman Square .
#Text=It climbs through the wooded Buda Hills and at the top .
#Text=To take M2 Szell Kalman Square further bus 56 or tram : 59 , 61 .
#Text=From station : Szell Kalman Square take bus 21 to stop ' Ordas út ' and walk 500m , near the Children 's Railway terminal , to the

#Text=Children 's Railway ( Gyermekvasút ) , Hűvösvölgy ( : Széll Kálmán tér further tram : 61 to stop Hűvösvölgy 5 min walk to Lower Terminal - - To Upper station ( Széchenyi-hegyi állomás ) take Cogwheel tram ( see above ) to the Upper station and 200m walk ) , ☏ +3613975392 , fax : +3613975396 , ✉ info@gyermekvasut.hu .
#Text=May-Sep all day , other only T-Su .
#Text=Using in the Buda Hills is a great escape from the city .
#Text=If you feel like doing it , take the Children 's Railway through the hills to Hüvösvölgy and take tram 61 back down to Széll Kálmán tér .
#Text=The cogwheel tram accepts local travelcards , but the Gyermekvasút does not , and fares can be found here .
#Text=Also if you have an old map , you 're supposed to find Pioneers ' Railway ( Úttörővasút ) instead of Children 's Railway in it , which is the former name of the railway from the soviet era .
#Text=More info : Budapest#Get around
#Text=OW/RW HUF700/1400 , student half price .
#Text=Zugliget Chair-lift ( Libegő ) , XII .
#Text=Zugligeti út , 97 ( Lower station ) ( : ' Széll Kálmán ' take a bus ) , ☏ +361 3255-255 , +36 1 394 3764 , ✉ bkk@bkk.hu .
#Text=This is a chair lift what taking you from " Zugliget " to Jan Mountain ( " János hegy " ) . Ft900 .
#Text=BKK tickets and passes are not valid. .
#Text=See
#Text=Adyliget St. Stephen 's Church ( Adyligeti Szent István templom ) , II .
#Text=Feketerigó u. 28 .
#Text=( From Huvosvolgy take bus 63 to stop Ady lepcso ) .

#Text=Béla Bartók Memorial House ( Bartók Béla Emlékház ) , Csalán út 29 ( 5-minute walk on the Csévi street , coming from the bus terminal ( no . 5 ) , at Pasaréti square , 1st bus 5 take at : Széll Kálmán tér ) , ☏ +361 394-4472 , ✉ bartok-1981@t-online.hu .
#Text=The final home of one of the greatest Hungarian composers .
#Text=Located at a very beautiful place and has a big garden .
#Text=- Bartók 's sheet music , books , CDs , DVDs , postcards are available in the Museum Music Shop .
#Text=Evening concerts : at 18:00 .
#Text=extraphone=+36 1 394-2100 Adult € 4 , student € 2 .
#Text=Tomb of Gül Baba and Rosegarden ( Gül Baba Türbe és rózsakert ) , II .
#Text=Mecset utca 14 . ( entrance : Türbe tér 1 . ) ( tram : 17 from Margit híd , Buda side to Szent Lukács Gyógyfürdő stop ) , ☏ +361 237-4400 , ✉ info@mnv.hu . 10:00 - 18:00 .
#Text=Built around 1548 by the Turkish occupants of the city .
#Text=It is the northernmost place of Muslim pilgrimage .
#Text=The beautiful view and the peacefulness of the place makes a visit worth .
#Text=Free .
#Text=Millenaris Park ( Millennium Park , Millenáris Park ) , II .
#Text=Kis Rókus u. 16 – 20 ( : Széll Kálmán tér further walk 500m or take tram : 4 , 6 one stop
#Text=) , ☏ +3613364000 , fax : +3613364012 , ✉ millenaris@millenaris.hu .
#Text=This is a cultural center for showing the Hungarian capital and Europe significant cultural and lifestyle values .
#Text=It is developed from an iron foundry , what founded Abraham Ganz in the ' Field of Pest roller mill ' ( Pesti Hengermalom ) company area .

#Text=There is the House of the Future exhibition hall ( Jövő Háza kiállítás ) with themes as genome research , spacecraft ( include the Hungarian Mars rover ) , astronomy or the lives of people with disabilities durable presentation ' Ability Park ' .
#Text=Located in the Great Hall ( Building B ) , this is a huge multi-level building .

#Text=The Pixel Gallery ( Building C ) has a similar spiral arrangement as the New York 's Guggenheim Museum , used for media arts and visual art exhibitions . Theater ( Teátrum ) is a nearly 0.7ha of assembly hall converted building , a kind of studio .
#Text=Used for TV studio , theaters and concert halls .
#Text=The Host or Building G ( Fogadó ) was built in 1930s , former machine repair , plating plant .
#Text=Used for concerts , child and family programs , studio theater performances , Chamber of Commerce exhibitions .
#Text=The Worm Gallery ( Csiga Galéria ) is a separate gallery space for contemporary art exhibitions .
#Text=The Loft ( Padlás ) , a theater space , with mobile auditorium for 150 to 200 people .
#Text=And also the park , a big green area ( 3.5ha ) . Vary .
#Text=Foundry Museum ( Öntődei Múzeum ) , II .
#Text=Bem József u. 20 ( TTram 4 , 6 to ' Mechwart liget ' , 2nd stop From : ' Szell Kalman square ' ) .
#Text=Th 10AM-4PM , F 10AM-2PM , Sa 10AM-4PM .
#Text=This is the one-time factory of Abraham Ganz , where the foundry existed even in 1960s . Ft800 .

#Text=Ruins of Pauline Monastery ( Pálos kolostor romjai ) , Budaszentlőrinc , over ' Szépjuhászné ' ( By Children 's Railway to train stop ' Szépjuhászné ' or From : ' Szell Kalman square ' take bus 22 to stop ' Szépjuhászné , Gyermekvasút '
#Text=) .
#Text=Built in 13-14th centuries .
#Text=Elizabeth Lookout ( Erzsébet kilátó ) , Janos-hill ( János-hegy ) ( Take the chair lift .

#Text=Budapest#Get around ' Libegő ' or From : ' Szell Kalman square ' take bus 90A to stop Normafa and strolling in wood 15 min , or take Children 's Railway to stop Janos-hill or Virágvolgy station and short woodland walk to lookout ) .
#Text=Daily 08:00 - 20:00 . is Budapest 's highest peak with its 527 meters .
#Text=Bajor Gizi Actors ’ Museum ( Bajor Gizi Színészmúzeum ) , Stromfeld Aurél út , 16 ( From : ' Deák tér ' take Bus 105 to Németvölgyi út stop ) , ☏ +3612253161 , ✉ bgm@ella.hu .
#Text=The museum covers decisive participants and events of almost 200 years of Hungarian theatre , from the strolling players of the 1820s up to the present moment .
#Text=Placed in a neo-baroque , early 20th century villa and its compelling garden and park .

#Text=) , ☏ +361 457-0501 , fax : +361 457-0500 , ✉ hegyvideki.budapest@museum.hu .

#Text=This is the largest and most beautiful located cemetery in Buda .

#Text=Villas on Bela Kiraly street ( Villák a ) , Bela Kiraly street , 27 , 29 , 33 , 34 ( multiple ) ( Cog wheel or bus 21 , 21A to stop ' Adonis utca ' take the rail underpass at ' Költő ' street and there start the Bela Kiraly street ) .
#Text=Just outside . Strolling between hundred or more years old buildings .
#Text=- Frivaldszky – villa , Mauthner – villa , Pálffy-villa .
#Text=Újlak Visitation of Our Lady Parish ( Újlak Sarlós Boldogasszony plébánia ) , III .
#Text=Bécsi út 32 . ( Bus 9 , 29 , 65 , 65A , 109 , 111 , 165 , tram : 17 , 19 , 41 , : Szépvölgyi út . ) , ☏ +361 335-3573 , ✉ iroda@ujlakitemplom.hu .
#Text=Masses M - Sa 6:30 and 18:00 , Su 9:00 , 10:30 and 18:00 .
#Text=- St. Stephen 's Chapel Masses Weekdays 17:30 , Su 9:00 & 11:00 .
#Text=Above the main entrance of the church in Latin inscription ( 1705 Creature Creator ) marks the year of founding of the parish .
#Text=For builders , mostly German-speaking Újlaki ( Neustift ) little more than fifty yearsfaithful took to build and furnish this church .
#Text=The building Christopher Hamon Nepauer Matthew was raised in 1746-1766 .
#Text=The main altar was designed by Christopher Hickisch in 1799 .
#Text=The tower formed hard : The first , which began to build above the center of the front facade had to be demolished before its have fallen .
#Text=Place it on the south side of the connector tower can still be seen .
#Text=Instead made ​​on the south side another tower , this can still be seen nowadays .
#Text=Top of the tower , " helmet " part , due to natural disasters , should be renewed twice .
#Text=Present form of the tower was completed according to the plans of Ybl Miklós in 1877 .
#Text=The " Water level " indicator plaque located in the little church , a memory for 1875 rainstorm that causes serious damage .
#Text=The frescoes made in 1920s .
